mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(user_id, username, password, nickname, email, phone, gender, birthday, city, avatar, marks, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) values(#{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{userNick}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userBirthday}, #{userCity}, #{userAvatar}, #{userMarks}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update sys_user set is_deleted=#{is_deleted} where user_id = #{userId}
